descriptionText: We have a sawmill, but it's got no service facilities for our iron monsters. Please, help us build two service buildings. We need cargo for construction. Will you take this contract?

cargo_needed: 1× Metal Planks; 1× Container Large; 1× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: There is an outstanding contract up in town. Help a local business owner complete some construction. He will make it worth your while!

cargo_needed: 1× Concrete Slab; 1× Wooden Planks; 1× Container Small
descriptionText: Our railway station needs a warehouse for storage. It won't only benefit our company but also expand the range of delivered cargo. Will you take this job?

displayName: The Unfinished Business At The Plant
cargo_needed: 1× Metal Planks; 1× Service Spare Parts; 1× Container Small
descriptionText: We have unfinished business - the plant construction. Help us complete this important task, and you'll be paid generously.

This task is a top priority for the region. The residents are cut off from each other because of the roadblock. It is crucial that we reestablish the connection ASAP. The administration will reward you!
The ferry at Duncan Bay is doing an important job safely taking vehicles across the river. It needs consumables for maintenance. Take this job, and we'll be grateful.
Power supply in the city gets interrupted all the time, we need a backup generator. Bring it to us, and we will reward you handsomely!
Please help me with my truck. I went off the road, and my engine died in the middle of the marsh. The truck must be delivered to the service center. I will make it worth your while.

cargo_needed: 1× Big Drills; 1× Big Drills; 1× Big Drills
descriptionText: Oil! Our oil rigs need special care, they need spare parts! Deliver three parts and get paid.
Some carriages got derailed. We need to get the lost containers as soon as possible. For that, you'll need a crane. Deliver the containers to the railway station. We'll pay you for that!

displayName: Service Center For The Drilling Station
descriptionText: In addition to the drilling station contracts, we also need to build a service center. Whether you help us or not, we'll pay for the delivery.
We have a special request for you, container delivery. It holds lots of iron for our weather station. Bring us the container, and we'll pay you for delivery.

cargo_needed: 1× Vehicles Spare Parts; 1× Crate Large; 1× Logs Short
descriptionText: Living in the woods is tough. We need tools to repair the trailer, some odds and ends and some firewood.

cargo_needed: 1× Service Spare Parts; 1× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: We need to check the equipment of the ski lifts, but we are short on tools and resources. Please help us, and we'll pay.
The observatory need massive weather data, so give them our HDD as soon as possible!
In winter, this is a serene ski resort, and in summer the organizers set up a real test! Steep slopes, difficult terrain... so just brace yourself and show what you can do!
We hear that you're the go-to person for any cargo deliveries. We've got a special contract for you - delivering a fishing boat. Are you game for this highly responsible task?
The Wildlife Protection officers need help. Now, they vitally need fuel. Deliver the fuel trailer from the city to their place.
Local fishers never got important cargo for their boats. The delivery trailer got stuck on the northwest road near the plant. Get it to the docks, and the fishers will pay you.
Our Port is the only point where heavy cargo is delivered by water. Your task is to ship two containers from us to Duncan Bay. You will get good money!
Force majeure has interrupted construction plans. People are short on some basic supplies. We gathered all the necessary things in two trailers. Deliver them to the construction site.
We need to confiscate this truck. It belonged to poachers. Fix the truck and deliver it to the service center. You'll be paid on site.
Our driver got stuck in the marshes with an oil tank. The road is too rough, this calls for a pro like yourself. Help us with the delivery, and we'll be even.
The region is barely explored, and the old bridges date back to our fathers' time. The bridge has to be rebuilt. Are you up to it?
As a business owner, I see that this city lacks a service center. Help me with construction. I have listed the materials I need. Will you help?
These rocks block the direct route. The locals will pay you handsomely if you help clear them.
Local geologists need a water probe from the two lakes in the North and South of North Peak Park. Paid by the piece!
This terrain is tough. Local residents like to race their cars here to the top of the hill. The view there is spectacular!
Wildlife Protection officers discovered a poacher hiding spot. Help the officers with the investigation. Study the situation, cooperation is rewarded.
We have collected some junk the poachers left behind. We need to get rid of this trailer. Have it recycled.
Hey, driver! I was heading for the plant but got stuck in those marshes. The truck is really good, too bad I'm a poor driver. Please help me, I'll owe you one.
The wooden bridge collapsed under the heavy trucks. Bridges collapse here quite frequently, so there are always a lot of jobs.
Geologists have warned us about the rockslide hazard here many times. Help us remove them, and people will thank you.
Fish farmers have a weird tradition. They compete to see who will be the first to deliver some waste barrels. Join the local games and show what you can do!
The poacher's boat is stuck, and its cargo has to be delivered to the police station. Use the crane to deliver the evidence.
Buddy, help me! My truck's stuck on this bad road. I need to have it pulled out and fixed. I'd be grateful for the help.

displayName: Uncle Fish Will Do This Job!
cargo_needed: 2× Bricks; 2× Metal Planks; 2× Crate Large; 2× Concrete Slab
descriptionText: Our company is expanding. We're making the best canned fish! Plant construction is our top priority, so we'll pay well for cooperation. Are you on board?

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks; 2× Bricks; 2× Vehicles Spare Parts
descriptionText: Sadly, we're not done with garage construction. Accept this contract, and we will be. The garage will be your home away from home!
The Communication Tower is out of order, it needs to be repaired. Bring the spare parts and materials needed for restoration to the repair crew.
We have dismantled the old water tower and we want to build a new one. Help us with the materials, and we'll pay for the delivery.
Local residents need instruments to remove this fallen tower. They will disassemble it, and you will get part of the money. Do we have a deal?

All those months of ignoring safety regulations while working in the mountains have finally caught up with me â the road is completely blocked by a rockslide. If you help me get those rocks out of there, I'll pay you handsomely.
We've got a problem area that always gets blocked every season. This time it's your job. But we'll pay you for your time!

No... no... this is all wrong. We need a real plane! Hey, could you give us a hand? I ordered the prop I need a long time ago, but it got stuck somewhere on the road. I need you to deliver it to me as soon as possible. I'm counting on you!
We need to finish work on the ski lift. Deliver the trailer containing the gear and materials we need, and then we'll settle up.
Could you repair the old warehouse? The roof caved in. It's not the end of the world, but we've still got some useful materials in there.
As if the harsh weather weren't enough, you can't even get a signal around here! Deliver some communication equipment to the movie set with the plane.
The sets turned out to be bigger than we thought. We're going to need some extra equipment. We almost had it, too, but something went wrong in shipping. Could you help us out?

displayName: The Right Tools For The Job
descriptionText: Listen, we've got a little situation here... we left a trailer full of tools at the lower ski station. Could you go get them? We're kind of swamped over here.
Spring came early this year, so the river overflowed and flooded the main roads. The workers couldn't get the trailers out, and we need them ASAP. Could you haul them the rest of the way here?
Our company wants to make sure every star who works with us feels right at home. We need you to deliver an expensive star trailer to the movie set, and we need it to get there in one piece.
We're done filming in the city, so please drive our A-lister to the next movie set. The road might be a bit tricky, but I'm sure you can make it!

cargo_needed: 3× Wooden Planks; 1× Logs Medium; 1× Bags; 2× Wooden Planks Medium
descriptionText: We've got a couple of unfinished cabins for people who like to look down at the local landscapes. We need to deliver the materials so they can finish the cabins.

We've got big news! A famous actor is coming here soon to film a new picture. Do you know what that means? We need letters over our town, just like the Hollywood sign! Help us make it happen, okay? Do it for art!

cargo_needed: 4× Metal Planks; 2× Metal Roll; 2× Wooden Planks; 2× Forklift Caravan Container 2
descriptionText: Your job is to deliver workers' cabins to the resort. You can pick them up at the factory. But first we need a generator to start manufacturing them. Time to get to work!

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks; 2× Crate Large; 1× Logs Short; 3× Wooden Planks
descriptionText: We need to finish up a few tourist cabins before resort seasons gets going, but we've got a delivery issue. We need your help. Don't worry, we'll make it worth your while.
Alright, just one last big push, and all our construction projects will be done. All we have to do now is deliver a few cable cars, and then we can open the resort!

A movie studio is shooting a new film nearby. We'd like to have a view of the surrounding area in case something happens and they need our help. Get the job done, and you'll have a front-row seat for the shoot!

The forestry service is getting ready for tourist season, so we want to make the area is as safe and well-supervised as possible. The towers are almost ready, but we still need some more materials. Deliver them, and enjoy those beautiful views while you're at it.
Like with any other construction project, we've got a bunch of leftover junk. We probably shouldn't just leave it here. There's a recycling plant nearby. Could you lug all this stuff over there?

cargo_needed: 2× Crate Large; 1× Crate Large; 1× Crate Large; 2× Crate Large
descriptionText: Spawning season is starting soon, and our fishermen's boats are broken. Help them! We need to make sure there's enough surströmming for everybody!

As you can see, we're shooting a movie here. The local countryside has some spectacular views, but, as I'm sure you understand, we still need extra set dressing in this business. Could you deliver all the supplies we need to build our sets?
We've got a problem: some essential supplies fell off a truck and landed right on the ice! We don't have the right gear to go back and get them. Do you think you can handle it?
I know that you are quite busy, but perhaps you could take up one more task? We would like to check those territories for contamination, but we don't have the technical means to do it. Can you help?
We`ve lost some essential equipment during shipping. The trailer is still by the river. Could you get it back for us?
I somehow managed to get lost in the swamp in the middle of the night. The country there was so rough, I had to leave my trailer. Please help me pull it out.

Here's the thing, I figured I'd give my beauty a little challenge and drove her down the route across the river. The engine died, but that's nothing. My poor car was swept away, and you're the only one who can help me pull it back out. I promise, I'll return the favor.

Aside from the odd storm, the weather around here is pretty calm. Unfortunately, our facility's power supply got hit this time. Help us deliver the trailer with our new generator so we can get the factory up and running again!

Hello! I took pictures of a troll! Then it chased me into a swamp, so I had to drop everything and run for my life. If you pull my vehicle out of the swamp, you can have it. All I need are the photos.
Hi there! You look like a nice guy who could do me a favor. Can you take this trailer and help my friend to fix his truck? I'd go myself, but I'm too busy delivering orders at the moment.
What rotten luck! I had to leave my trailer on the ridge. I'd really appreciate it if you could deliver it to us. I'll pay you, of course.
You'll never believe this, bud! My vehicle fell of a rocky ledge. Could you help me get it out of there?
Hey you, the pro driver! I've heard about your skills. Mine aren't looking so hot â my favorite trailer got stuck in the mud. Help me pull it out, okay?
I'd rather not tell you how my vehicle got stuck in the swamp, and I DEFINITELY don't want to explain it to my wife. Drag it out of there for me, would you? I'll pay you.
My vehicle is stuck! Can you help me pull it out? I need it delivered to the movie set on the double! We'll settle up when you get there.
The bridge is out, so we've been taking detours around it. Help us fix it â we'll make it worth your while.
We've got an urgent job, but the cargo we need to deliver is stuck by the shore. Could you please get all three loads and deliver them for us?
Our driver dropped a couple of barrels by the cliff while moving on a difficult route. Help him find and recover them.

Welcome to our humble abode! It's our tradition to host annual springtime races for the local fishermen. The flood washed out the roads this year, but that's what makes it even more fun! Wanna join us?
We sure are lucky Nordic movies are at the peak of popularity. That said, great expectations demand great quality! It's time to drive our A-lister to the next movie set.

We're finally resuming shooting in the new location. In order to get the set ready and start filming, we're going to require some materials and props in containers. Please deliver them to the movie set, and expect a generous compensation.
As you may know, we're really enthusiastic about waste, or rather its recycling. On that note, the local recycling plant needs some upgrades. Deliver the gear they need to eliminate pollution!
If we're going to supervise the area, we'll need to build a watchtower. Deliver the materials, and you'll get your reward.
Look, I'm in a bit of a tight spot right now, and I really need my car delivered here. Can you do that for me? I'll pay you for the trouble.
The spring season brings its share of trouble. The passage is blocked, and we're going to need some tools to clear the rubble.
All that's left is to film the final episode at the last movie set. The crew's ready and waiting for the star of the show. Please drive the VIP trailer to the movie set.

Seeing that the recycling plant is working again, it's up to us to deliver waste for recycling. Naturally, we're going to need a delivery driver, so we were thinking of signing with you again. The pay will be good!
We have to complete construction of the watchtower to secure our control over the West. It's critical that you help us here. Will you?

Thanks for your service! At first, I wasn't too sure you were the right person for the job, but now I see how wrong I was. Your name will go down in film production history! We hope to work with you again!
We're in urgent need of some junk for filming. On top of that, our driver got stuck in the middle of nowhere and knocked over that trailer we really need. Bring it all here, and the reward is yours!
If you'd like to drive down a decent road, help me clear the rubble first. I'll be generous with your pay.

We're doing our best to provide great customer service. Tourist cabins are in need of renovation, so we're going to need some construction materials. Deliver some, and we'll be sure to compensate you for your efforts.
The area is still littered with junk, mostly left by the construction workers. Collect the waste and deliver it to the recycling station. We'll be sure to pay you for the job.

There has been an unfortunate railroad accident, and this area has been struggling with logistics issues ever since. Two damaged rail pieces require replacement. Please deliver and install them where they're needed.
We replenish our water supply once every few weeks. The weather has been rough lately, and you're the only delivery driver we can trust. We're sure you'll live up to our expectations.
Winter may be over, but the nights are still freezing! We need some firewood to keep the cabins warm. Could you help us deliver it?
We need to check out the northern mountain trail. It's a difficult and dangerous route, so you're the only one who can handle the job. Of course, you'll be compensated accordingly.
Some tourists lost control of the car last night and left it on the tourist trail. We know the approximate location of the car. You just need to drive around and find it.
A white fox darted across the road in front of me, and I lost control of my car! I'm just glad the poor critter is safe, and repairing the car won't be a problem. Please help me recover it first.

Well, if it isn't our friend! See that car over there in the swamp? She's been stuck there forever. Many people tried and failed to salvage her, and if you manage to get her out, she's sure to serve you well.
It's a mighty river, all right! I was unlucky enough to face its current while transporting the shipment. Please help me recover the lost cargo! I promise to make it up to you.

This wooden bridge once served as passage for mountain climbers looking for the most challenging trails, eventually collapsed due to old age. Just deliver some wood, and the bridge will be as good as new.
The bridge collapsed, failing the test of time. It requires urgent repairs, so we'll need construction materials delivered. Please help us so traffic can resume in this area.
As ironic as it is, the repair station needs to be repaired. Bring us the construction materials so we can get back to work.

Aside from being the ultimate relaxation spots, lakes also serve as natural fresh water reservoirs. That's why we're doing our best to combat water contamination. We have our work cut out for us, so we're going to need some samples for analysis.

The mine in the northern part of the region is long since abandoned, but we just got our hands on fresh water samples with a curious anomaly. You can expect good pay for scanning the rocks around the mine.
Right, so we're really short-handed and there's this gold bullion due for delivery yesterday. Will you please deliver it as fast as you can?
Hiya, friend! This is urgent. We were planning to film a ski resort ad, but our driver is out sick. Can you drive around real quick and get some footage of these gorgeous local views?
We've got the transformer yard and the main power grid, but certain lines still need some work. First things first, let's get this factory connected to the grid.

cargo_needed: 2× Solar Panel; 1× Solar Panel; 1× Metal Planks; 1× Solar Panel; 1× Metal Planks
descriptionText: Splitting uranium atoms isn't the only way to power thingsâsolar power is good for that too! We've been ask to deliver some solar panels to a bunch of weather towers. It's the 21st century. Who needs batteries, right?

We used to have a ferry running between the two towns, but with the docks closed down for repairs, logistics have been disrupted. The sooner we fix those docks up, the sooner you'll have an easier way to cross over.
The part of the road leading to the weather tower up north is really rough. We'd like to build a bridge there for the sake of convenienceâget us some wood, and we'll do the job.
The earthquakes in the area have left us a couple of nasty surprises on the road. Let's clear the rubble from the direct route to the factory, okay?

cargo_needed: 3× Service Spare Parts; 3× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: As luck would have it, two of the weather towers are now down for the count. We need to get them the supplies they need for repairs right away. Looks like the guys have found something really exciting there!
Same story hereâthe docks are undergoing maintenance, but I can see a boat on the other side. We should give her the opportunity to dock here too, don't you think?
Next up, there's an electric transmission line we need to finish. As you can see, they're all spic-and-span here, so be careful when you deliver the metal beams, okay?
We've got a logistics issue with the eastern weather tower, too. The solution is the same hereâwe need to build a wooden bridge!
We've got another road blocked by a landslide. The usual method should work hereâjust deliver the supplies and leave the rest to us.
Just one more ETL to go. We still need metal beams, and I hope you didn't park our trailer too far away...

Now that the power plant is done, it's time to get the buildings in the area some juice. We should start by finishing the transformer substation. It's basically doneâwe're just missing materials for a couple of units.
We've got an emergency! Part of a bridge has broken downâwe need to repair it ASAP! Some of the researchers are now stuck on that islandâtheir only way out is swimming.
This hunk of junk broke on us. Can you believe it? We've got dozens of deliveries waiting at the port, and the easiest way to cross that wall of water just bit the dust! We need it fixed, stat.

We were driving around taking soil samples when a landslide suddenly wiped out one of the roads. We had to ditch the vehicle and run for our lives. The poor thing is still stuck there. Can you help us get it out?

We had to cut down some trees to clear the plot of land for the substation. Some of the logs went to the sawmill, but not all of them. We need to get the rest of them to the town warehouse for further processing.
There's been another addition to our regionâradio telescopes. These astronomical tools aren't just for studying celestial objects; they can also help us assess our water EM radiation levels.

cargo_needed: 1× Sensory Buoy; 1× Sensory Buoy; 1× Sensory Buoy
descriptionText: Finally, a one-of-a-kind job! We need to pick up some data buoysâthey're the latest thing in marine research tech. They need to be dropped off at the specified aquatic locations.
What were we doing in an off-road vehicle, you ask? Looking for a spot for yet another weather tower, of course! But since landslides are a concern, we should check a seismic vibrator.
That's right, we can't waste a good hill and NOT build something on top of it. This one's easyâjust grab a radar trailer and bring it to the specified location.

So we dispatched an order to another factory, but the truck set out with an empty tank, somehow. Needless to say, it didn't get far before it ran out of gas on the highway. Can you get the goods to their destination?
Hey, man! My car died on me right when I was hauling a fully-stocked trailer. Could you tow it to the other shore for me? I'd be much obliged!
Hey friend, I need some help. We forgot a bunch of spare partsâcould you get the trailer carrying them to the transformer yard on the other shore? It has the tools we really need, too.

As you probably know, we're building a highway that's supposed to connect the two shores. We need some extra supplies and workers' cabins brought over to the other side. I heard you might be able to do the latter for us.
I can't get a hold of my logistics guy for some reason, and there's a shipment of all kinds of car parts waiting for us at the port. Could I trouble you to do the job and get that shipment to me?
One of our researchers left without this order. Please deliver it as quickly as you can. Hurrying won't be enough, you'll practically need to teleport!

Unfortunately, there's not much to clean on this route nowadays, and we aren't even sure if we even need to. With that in mind, what do you say to driving the route as fast as you can? Are you willing to accept the risks?

cargo_needed: 2× Service Spare Parts; 2× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: HELP! Our wind farm substation just croaked, along with a couple of turbines. We need to do some maintenance to get the farm running again. We're expecting some supplies and a trailer, but it's nowhere to be seen...

The turbo generator stator is the heaviest piece of equipment at the power plant. They can't start the reactor without it, but the transportation requirements are really strict. Good luck out thereâyou're gonna need it.
One of the hydrology field camps needs some extra supplies right away. Looks like a logistics errorâthe guys forgot some things they needed.

One of the workers building the highway got drunk and left a vehicle idling at the construction site. It ran out of gas, and no one's been able to move it since. I say we get it out of thereâit just might come in handy.

cargo_needed: 2× Logs Short; 4× Logs Medium; 1× Logs Long
descriptionText: While the sawmill was idle, our backlog got so bad, we almost went through our entire log supply. Another delivery isn't scheduled for a while yet, but you've got some free time on your hands, so I bet you can handle it.
The list of special deliveries for our power plant also includes multistage pumpsâthey're the last things we need to put our turbine hall into operation. Please be extra careful with them.

displayName: There's Prep, and Then There's Prep
descriptionText: And that's our nuclear power plant, the crown jewel of the energy industry! Impressive, right? We're mostly done with constructionâjust a couple of urgent deliveries left to make. Let's start with something easy.

We take to any kind of power source like ducks to water, but when it comes to protecting the environment, solar power is hands-down the best! We've got nearly all the panels in placeâjust one more shipment to go.

We usually have a rainy spell this time of the year, but this time, something's gone wrong. Why don't we have an irrigation system? Good question... but let's not go there, okay? Let's just deal with this for now.

The authorities thought we should capitalize on this place's reputation as the nuclear power hub of the future and build a monument in the town closest to the power station. Can we count on you to deliver the supplies?

cargo_needed: 2× Service Spare Parts; 2× Metal Planks; 4× Metal Roll
descriptionText: Unfortunately, we've been shut down by a malfunction at the sawmill. Wood is an essential construction material for the plant, its units, and other things. We need you to deliver the parts to the sawmill on the double.

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks Medium; 3× Wooden Planks; 2× Vehicles Spare Parts
descriptionText: We're doing a lot of work here, so testing our water seemed like a good idea. Our experts have set up camps in appropriate places, but now we need some additional supplies. That's where you come in.

Railroad trouble is one of the reasons we're behind schedule with this building. One section has to be replaced, and another has a pile of rocks blocking the way. Things will speed up once you deal with these issues.
We've got a major order, and I think you should take it now that the trains are running again. Some fat cat needs a big new boiler for the ranch he's just bought and wants to remodel.

Believe it or not, we almost made it to the power plant when our rig's rear wheels lost traction, the trailer ripped out of the coupling and sent the cargo flying into the river. We need everything backâcan you do that?

Some guys from Tennessee organized a swamp race in these partsâkind of like a rally. But one of the contestants dropped out early, and his stalled car blocked a prizewinner. Let's get it out of the way, okay?
I messed up when crossing a bridge so bad that my car got flipped on its side. I'm fine other than a couple of bruises, but the car... Anyway, I'd really appreciate it if you towed it back to me.

So, I decided to take my girlfriend out somewhere nice at nightâgot her flowers and all that jazz. But the car got stuck along the way! All my romantic plans fell through, and I had to ditch the car, too. Fetch it for me, will you?

So, my car broke down, and I called a local mechanic for help. He is... an interesting character, because he picked the most convoluted way to get to me and ended up stuck, naturally. Could you get his trailer out?

So, our wind turbines broke down, but when we tried to fix them using our own resources, my trailer with all the tools got stuck. Our help's not needed anymore, but I'd still like to get my trailer back, you know. Could you retrieve it?

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks Medium; 3× Wooden Planks; 1× Wooden Planks Long; 2× Wooden Planks
descriptionText: Like we said before, there's a huge backlog of wood orders. Some locals have been waiting foreverâcould you do us a favor and deliver a bunch of planks to these locations?

As you probably know, the whole region is tectonically active, so we've got roadblocks left, right, and center here. This one in particular has cut us off from the NPP construction site. We need that road clear, stat!
We need some tools and spare parts to keep everything running like a well-oiled machine. Could you help us out? We'll owe you one!

We had to take a different route because of all the recent roadblocks, but we were NOT ready for it, and all the shipping containers ended up scattered. They're full of electronics for the power plant! Will you help us?
We needed to move some hay between ranches, but, of course, the road we picked was trash, so some of the hay is still decorating the hills by the river. Could you gather it back up for us?

That's right, we ARE those Tennessee guys! We decided to set us up a little swamp race to see who's the best driver 'round these parts. Lots of people have already signed upâit's gonna be great! So how about it? Wanna give it a try?

Psst, it's the Tennessee guys again! So we're holding another race, but there's a catch. We don't have the official go-ahead for this one! Are you ready to risk it all and zip along a crazy dangerous mountain track?

Another important part of a nuclear plant is the cooling towers. They remove heat from the circulating water used in the plant. They're big in every sense of the word, so your cargo will be too. Think you can handle it?

We've decided to revamp our cooling circuit a bit by adding a couple of bridges over the waterways. It's more of the usualâjust bring us some metal and concrete to work with, and we'll get the job done.
The old watchtower on the island is a real relic of the past. But despite the fact that it could collapse at any moment, it's kind of a local landmark. We need to fix it up ASAP!

In addition to the garage, we also need somewhere we can park our cars and provide all kinds of repair services. As you can see, construction is in full swingâwe just need you to deliver some supplies...

So there my family and I were, having a great time outdoors on our picnic, when I noticed my car rolling towards the cliff's edge. Somehow, it didn't fall, but it's hanging on by a thread. Can you get it out for me?

Believe it or not, some delinquents have siphoned all the gas from our cars! How the hell are we supposed to get around now?! The factory's management is willing to provide us with fuel, but we need you to get it here.
Mayday, mayday! We've been having issues with operating electronics due to bad reception. Could you help us fix the comms tower?
We were coming back from a delivery when our vehicle got stuck in some mud. They were able to tow the car, but the semi-trailer is still hanging out there. Could you please get it back for us?
The local retreat ran out of some groceriesâright when they had updated their menu and were receiving guests, too! We got the order, you understand, and now the packages need to be delivered.
I was always told I was a natural driver. So, I always drove on our roads without thinking about what I was doing, and now I've paid the price for my hubris. Could you please help me, poor driver?
Some people choose to build their homes really out of the way, and plumbing can pose a bit of an issue out there. Could you help us deliver some water to this location?

The issues at the port a while ago caused one of the ships to crash after being unable to dock properly. We've learned it was carrying some pretty valuable cargoâcould you check if there's anything worth salvaging?
I know this ain't no fishing festival, but we're still in need. Tools to repair this thing, more specifically. It shouldn't take longâwill you do it?
We know the condition of routes emanating from the asphalt road in excruciating detail, but we don't know the condition of this particular road. Can you give your professional opinion?

cargo_needed: 2× Concrete Slab; 2× Container Small; 2× Metal Planks
descriptionText: Time to get the second one up and running. Is this water radioactive, you ask? Not at all! The radioactive water heated by the core runs through a separate circuit, heating and vaporizing water in the other one. Got it?

We've got two waterways, which means we need two bridges. We could just drive around the whole thing, but why not make our lives easier if we've got the funds? Hey, did your eyes just turn into dollar signs for a second?
Think about it. Small townâcheck! Big construction siteâcheck! Old and new vehicles in need of maintenanceâcheck! I could go on, but you get the point. We need the whole package for our garage!
Our old barn has been completely overgrown with weeds, and as to what happens inside, well, it's better not to know. That why it's time to clear away this rubbish. That's where you come in.
Hey! I was driving this little truck along the coast and got stuck. Well, I was the one who chose the road! Could you help me tow it out?

We've got another remote residence cut off from the water supply. Please fill up your tank and hurry over there before they file a complaint! Yeah, I know, we messed up, but we'll compensate you for the trouble.
Forest rangers are having difficulty reaching observation towers. We need to perform a quality assessment of the coastal roads. So, drive along this route with your knowledge and a timer.

As you might have heard, we had an incident at the port: it's flooded. No worries though, we've got a clean-up crew on it and we're still accepting shipments. The only real issue is one of the cranes...
Didn't we have a conversation about dry ârainyâ seasons before? I think you said something about irrigation systems... anyway, please fill those water tanks. The farmers are counting on you.

cargo_needed: 2× Metal Roll; 1× Metal Planks; 2× Vehicles Spare Parts
descriptionText: So you're saying the trailer parking lot needs to be right by the garage? That'd definitely be convenient, but this is a job from a corporate client, and as far as I know you'll be able to buy those trailers later on.

We've got a problem. The dam is fine, but because of certain internal malfunctions, water is no longer being pumped into the tanks. This has to be fixed right away, since the guys in town need tons of water right now.

They're shutting down the nearby mine until all the power plant units are built. The workers were in such a hurry to go home, they forgot to clear the mines properly. We are talking a couple of containers of waste. You know where I'm going with this?

Taking into account the large number of landslides and low-magnitude earthquakes, we'd like you to test some areas for seismic activity. It's especially important because of the mine and the people working in it.
The flood didn't just damage the loading docksâour power unit took a hit, too. We urgently need an independent power supply. Luckily, the closest logistics center has one available.
We're almost done getting ready for the annual fishing festival, but we still need some supplies to fix the old boats. Do you think you'll be able to get them here on time?

Yup, yup, put that right here. Oh, there you are! You've been a huge help, but could you do me another favor? I need my trailer and a bunch of scrap paper brought over from the observatory. Gonna make us a bonfire!
Our oil well is pretty old, but it's still going strong. The issue actually lies with the refinery. We need new storage tanks and some parts to fix things up and actually ship the goods.

This old plant fell into disrepair over time, but we decided to whip it back into shape, and it's almost ready now. We just need some supplies for the repairs and a generator to get us through the initial period.

The observatory staff needs accurate data straight from my favorite satellites, so they've decided to build additional radio telescopes closer to the facility. Are you busy right now? Any chance we could clone you?

cargo_needed: 2× Logs Short; 2× Logs Medium; 3× Logs Short; 1× Logs Long; 1× Logs Short; 1× Logs Medium; 1× Logs Long
descriptionText: Since the regional renovation plan was approved, the land has been selling like hotcakes. People are eager to build houses here, so we've had a huge uptick in log orders. Good thing there's no shortage of logs...

Now that we've started processing the freshly-pumped oil, we need to have it delivered to the main port. Be careful not to spill anything, or our hydrologist friends are gonna have our heads on a platter.

cargo_needed: 2× Forklift Caravan Container 2; 2× Metal Planks; 4× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: Welcome to the most remote part of the region. Abandoned utility buildings and a couple of houses are the only signs of life left here. I think we should start by repairing the train stationâfor the sake of logistics.

The construction on the cooling towers is done, but big sites like that always get messy. We've sorted the debris into separate containers, so all you need to do is deliver them to the train station and see them off.

cargo_needed: 2× Service Spare Parts; 2× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: There are several places where the tracks are obstructed by rubble. You're probably sick of it at this point, but could you please help us out one more time? It's the last thing we need to get the trains running here.

Our old astronomer friends like to keep up with advances in tech, so they've ordered some new solar panels and maintenance supplies. You help them out, and who knows? Maybe they'll name their next discovery after you...
Here comes the first batch of nuclear waste! We've got a train waiting at the station to haul it away. Be careful with this cargo! We really don't want to mess up and hurt the environment.
People tell all kinds of stories about this old abandoned town. Personally, I don't believe in paranormal stuff like ghosts and the undead, but why don't you drive around and see for yourself?

There was just an accident involving a fuel truck. Some of the gas leaked into the river, and the scientists are furious now! We need to get the truck out right away and assess the level of contamination.
Hey friend, can you tow a truck for us? The driver decided to take a shortcut but lost control of his vehicle. Luckily, he wasn't hurt too bad, but that truck is a no-go...

We made camp and spent a few days in this beautiful place. Then I decided to head into the city for groceries, but I took a slightly different way back. Now the car is in a ditch, but I somehow emerged unscathed. Could you help me pull it out?
Yeah, I know, the roads are awful here. We're working on restoring the region, and you've been a great help. But uh, you know... We had a trailer full of logs, and now we need it towed...

An incident happened on the job. My truck got stuck on the road. I had to abandon the trailer, and barely made it out with just the tractor unit. If you can help me with the trailer, I'll pay you handsomely.
As soon as I stepped on the gas, the semi-trailer broke free! It rolled over the edge and fell down the slop. Listen, help me get it back.
I always back my jeep right up to the boats to make loading easier, but it looks like the river bank eroded this time, and my car ended up sinking. Can you help me pull it out and tow it to my house?

Hey bud, could you possibly tow our car to the old town? My friends and I were planning to explore it, but we took a detour to that pretty lake, and the rest is history. We could actually use some repairs, too...

cargo_needed: 1× Forklift Caravan Container 2; 2× Vehicles Spare Parts
descriptionText: We want to finish the construction project, even though the company basically hijacked our truck. We're short on time but there's a lot to do, meaning we need more manpower, workers' cabins, and spare parts.
We're planning to remodel our home. We really need construction materials. Ordinary delivery drivers can't make it up here, but you are a special driver. Could you help us?
This bridge was pretty worn down as it is, and the latest tremors were the final straw. This was the shortest way to the watchtower, too. Can we count on you?
Earth tremors aren't uncommon in this region, but Mother Nature outdid herself when she dumped a landslide on the old town bypass. Could you help us move the rubble?
We've got another challenge for you! How fast can you travel the coastline? It's not your usual routeâlots of water and rocks; people almost never go there. You up for some thrills?

Hey, a new worker! We need as much help as we can get right now. To make a long story short, we're still getting the new quarries sorted out, and we haven't had time to move the equipment from the old quarry to the logistics center yet. It shouldn't take more than twenty minutes or so, just a quick trip. Would you mind?

We're hard at work getting production up and running again. It's going pretty well, but we're short on slate. It just so happens that they've got a batch of slate ready to ship out over at the slate quarry. We literally just need a couple of little rocks. Would you mind?

cargo_needed: 2× Metal Planks; 2× Service Spare Parts; 2× Metal Planks; 2× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: Lousy piece of junk! The conveyor belt broke down in two places at the same time! We've got a big order to fill, and we need to act fast. We need spare parts and metal rods. Can you deliver the entire order to these coordinates?

Time may be the great equalizer, but all great things come from small beginnings. Take us, for example: we need concrete to restore the main part of the building. After that, we're going to need all the construction debris hauled away. Think you can handle it?

The old system of underground mine shafts could cave in because of the work we've been doing in the new deposits, so we need to get some information about the current condition of these abandoned shafts. Feel like testing the soil for sturdiness?

Welcome to our town! We're having some issues with the power right now, and we're almost out of candles, but the mining company has agreed to lend us a couple of generators. Would you mind grabbing them from the logistics center?
Listen, pal... remember the equipment you hauled to the logistics center? Well, my boss wants us to move it to the new silver quarry now. Do me a solid, would ya?

To make a long story short, pal, we've got a big order, and our client doesn't mess around. We need you to haul a couple of big blocks to the airport, and we really want to see how fast you can get the job done. Alright, off you go!

Before we can get the airport running again, we need to repair the flight control deck and the unloading area. We'll need metal sheets and some containers to make it happen. We're almost to the finish line!

displayName: Cloudy with a Chance of Rocks
descriptionText: This conveyor belt used to work like gangbusters. And it still does, as long as it's run by people who know what they're doing... and have plenty of parts and metal rods, of course. You deliver the parts, we'll get the old girl back on her feet. Then we'll be off to the races!

To stop kids from playing in the new slate quarry, we've been telling them there's a terrifying creature living at the bottom that'll take them away. But, thanks to our safety regulations, we still need to make sure the rock stratum is stable. Would you mind checking it out?

We just got a batch of bricks for repairing unsafe apartment buildings. We need them delivered to the processing workshop in the village. It's urgent, and we don't have enough drivers or vehicles. We need your help!

The tank turned over in the quarry! Without fuel, workers can lose their minds! Urgently, take the damaged tank to the logistics center. And the new tank with barrels needs to be picked up at the gas station and distributed to the quarries.

Silver is a valuable thing, so silver mining has to be done quickly. The new silver quarry is full of cavities that could lead to a cave-in, so we need to quickly check the rock stratum to make sure it's secure. Can you do it?

The inspector found damage to the buildings' concrete, so it's going to take more than just bricks to fix the problem. The concrete factory has sent us a couple of plates. Now we just need to have the local craftsmen saw them into blocks and deliver them to town.

cargo_needed: 1× Container Large Drilling; 5× Service Spare Parts Special
descriptionText: The quarry's going full blast now! Well, almost... we're still missing a few things: a new drill and some parts for it. They've already been delivered to the airport, but we still need to have them shipped here so we can try them out.

displayName: The Treasury is Empty, My Lord
descriptionText: Here's the first batch of processed silver. We need to deliver it to the airport and unload it. I hope you realize how important this cargo is... so please don't lose it or wander off with it. If all goes well, we'll pay you a pretty penny. Sound good?

Things are running pretty smoothly now! After we got the factory running, my boss decided to replace some of the old mine carts to speed things up a bit. The only problem is that they still need to be shipped to the quarry from the plant. Think you can help us out?

displayName: In the Ruins of Former Glory
cargo_needed: 4× Vehicles Spare Parts; 4× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: The silver plant is all set to start running again. We just need to repair a couple of fitting assembles, but we can't do it without some special parts. Can we count on you to deliver them?

We were supposed to get some new parts from town: two filters boxes, a filters box large, a compressor with extra power, a box of batteries, and a large burner. The delivery's been delayed. Do you think you could grab it for us?

In addition to mining, we also need to predict the future movements of rock strata. Scanning the area with a special radar could help with this. The important thing is to find the right place to put the radar.

Of all the rotten luck! I was hoping to shorten my route to the quarry by cutting through this ditch. I calculated all the risks carefully, but I suck at math, so now I'm stuck. Since you're here, would you mind giving me a hand?

I heard you helped the locals fix the water tower. Well, we could use some help with water in the quarries too. We've already got a tank all ready for you. You just need to go to the old quarry and pick it up.

They're about to start a new construction project at the helicopter pad, and, as you can see, the crew trailer we ordered has been held up. I'd hate to leave the workers without a roof over their heads, but I also can't get there on my own. Could you give me a lift?

My God, it's a good thing nobody got hurt. The cable barely hung on â it's a wonder it didn't snap. It sure took a pounding, though. I'm gonna need some help to get my vehicle out of here. It's stuck pretty good. Could you give me a hand?

Man, this was a hell of a car back in the day! 92 horsepower, light, easy to drive... and now all she's good for is scrap. Think you could tow her to the garage for me? It'll be way easier for me to fix her up there.

This place is perfect for scanning! I've already submitted a request for the equipment, and the radar is waiting at the logistics center. I just need someone to deliver it, and then I can turn it on and start scanning. Well begun is half done, am I right?

My buddy and me decided to start traveling in our old age. It's a good thing we made up high â there was a landslide last night that damaged our vehicle. We ain't exactly spring chickens â we're not about to push that thing all the way to town. Feel like giving a couple of old geezers a tow?

Your environment can really affect your mood, you know? Well, we've got a whole bunch of trash piled up from all the work we've been doing, and it's made working here pretty unpleasant. Cold you lug all this junk to the recycling center for us?

cargo_needed: 1× Barrels Oil; 1× Barrels Oil; 1× Barrels Oil; 1× Barrels Oil; 1× Barrels Oil
descriptionText: Thanks for stopping by, pal! Here's the thing... we really need some gas, or pretty soon we won't be able to run our generators anymore. And without them, things will start going south around here in a hurry. We'll owe you one!

cargo_needed: 1× Wooden Planks Medium; 2× Wooden Planks; 2× Metal Planks
descriptionText: The only true constant is change, and that goes double for support structures in mines â they're always getting swapped out. So we need new beams to make sure there isn't a cave-in in either the silver quarry or the slate quarry.

It's great to see you! You'll never believe what happened â the local water truck's engine died, and now it's just sitting idle. We're running out of water, and without it, we're in big trouble. Would you help us out and bring us some water from the local water tower?

The pipes are in pretty rough shape. Aside from this old water tower, there's nowhere else to get water. As always, the pipes burst, time flies, and the water's all gone. We gotta fix it. Don't worry about the pay â the whole village pitched in for this one.

Greetings, traveler! We don't get many visitors around here. But since you're here, would you mind helping us out? The government can't give us any vehicles to deliver food to the camps, and our supplies are running out. We won't haggle about the price!

Come in! Airfield dispatch here. We're in urgent need of fuel! If we don't get some soon, we'll need to start canceling flights. We require assistance ASAP. Repeat, we require assistance ASAP! Awaiting delivery from the nearest fuel station. Over and out.

displayName: Cranes, Saws, and Three Smoking Logs
descriptionText: These are top-notch evergreen trees â raised in Siberia, chopped down in Zherbaisk, and as long as a five-story building. But what's the point? They're just lying there rotting away while we wait for the crane operator to start his shift. Would you mind hitching them to your truck and delivering them to the village?

This bridge served the people of this village for a long, long time. But the soil shifted due to the mining operation, and the bridge collapsed. The villagers have saved up enough to fix it, but they still need to have the necessary resources delivered.

This is bad... I can't get reach the emergency relief service! There's barely any signal here anyway. Looks like we're on our own. I'll get the workers together while you bring us some parts for clearing the landslide. We'll settle up afterwards, okay?
Jeep for sale! For parts/not working. Doesn't start. Been outside for a long time. Needs new engine, power train, and gearbox. Reasonable offers considered.

Dammit, some stone blocks fell off the side! They're blocking the other way out of the quarry now. We need to get this sorted in a hurry. It shouldn't take more than a couple hours â you just need to bring us some metal rods and parts.
This bridge didn't make it through the last landslide, so it's out of commission at the moment. It hung on as long as it could, but nature had the last laugh. Looks like we gotta fix it. You in?

Sometimes double-checking something just isn't enough! So would you mind doing me a little favor? I need you to take a drive around the conveyor belt's connecting points and make sure they look alright... just in case.

displayName: All Roads Lead to the Tower
descriptionText: Our central tower has an excellent view of the area. I recommend checking it out. And while you're at it, you can evaluate the condition of the road. Is it passable for tourists? I'm not asking you to do it for free, of course!
We don't use the detour that often, but the asphalt road to the plant is really worn out. The rock also isn't particularly stable thanks to all the mining. Could you check the route?

The Aidakhar is a wily creature indeed! I've been after it for twenty years now. They say it's been spotted in the lakes here at night, but I need to be certain! The faster you can search the coastline, the more chances you'll have to catch it!
Hey, traveler, we have a little contest here every year to see who can make it up and down the mountain paths the fastest. Anybody can enter, by the way. Should I sign you up?
Looks like our warehouse was struck by lightning! We need to have it replaced. Could you dismantle whatever's left and help us build a new one?

cargo_needed: 3× Metal Planks; 2× Metal Roll; 2× Wooden Planks Medium
descriptionText: The bridge is almost ready, although the guys on one end are out of supplies, and the guys on the other need special equipment. Start with whatever you want, but this bridge needs to be finished. Can we count on you to deliver both?

We're the only ones who have access to water extraction equipment in the area. Heavy use has caused a lot of wear and tear in the pipes, so they need to be replaced right away. Our usual driver's on sick leave, which is why we need your help delivering supplies.
Stop right there! The port's closed. We've run out of fuel, and our ship's engine is out of whack. I guess you could help us out if you need to cross. We do have a crane...

When it rains, it pours... we can't get a hold of our farmhands Tucker and Dale. I sure hope those two are okay, but we can't wait around until they show up. Could you give us a hand? We'll pay for your trouble.

We weren't expecting so much rain. Our main shop got flooded. The equipment is starting to rust, and we need to get it up and running ASAP. We're on a deadline here! David should've checked the roof properly when I told him...

A little while ago I noticed an old, rusted-out tractor in the marsh. I think it could serve us well if we retrieved it and fixed it up. We can't do it without some additional equipment, but Elias happens to have the right trailer for the job.

Our farms have been getting a lot of orders for soybeans, but the latest shipment of seeds didn't arrive on time 'cuz of all the rain. Transportation issues shouldn't stop our customers from getting their goods. Could you help us out?

cargo_needed: 6× Stack; 4× Potato; 2× Wooden Planks; 2× Logs Medium
descriptionText: Ugh, we thought we had everything all set up â the flags, the display cases, the tables and chairs â but we forgot the most important thing: entertainment and food! Good thing the crops are ready for harvesting, and there should be enough hay to go around. We'll pay you well if you help out.

Hey there! I'm in a bit of a bind here. My son is in Vienna for a couple of weeks, and I'm worried our hay could rot by the time he gets back thanks to all this rain. Please help me till and harvest the field. I'm too old to do it alone.

The owner of the castle placed a top-secret order and asked us to keep an eye on it, but then the damn flood came, and everything just washed away. Please help me find the containers before he decides to order a guillotine...

Harvest season is upon us, which means we need to stay on top of tractor repairs. But with all this rain, we just couldn't get ready in time. Could you help us out with the fuel and check on a shipment for us? The delivery is running late for some reason.

Hello there. The name's Willie. Joe, Albert, and I have been planting potatoes for decades now, but we're not getting any younger, and we could use some help. Would you mind doing some field work for us?

I see you're all ready to go, but first things first â we need to see what we're working with. Could you check the farms in the area for us? We need to get a sense of the extent of the damage. We'll pay you after you hand in your report.

With so little time before the construction deadline, our drivers tend to forget that the weight capacity of a trailer is limited. Because of this, some trailers get stuck along the way. I guess we'll just have to tow them... you in?
Jeez, these sharp turns are driving me nuts. I'm not getting behind the wheel again â that's where you come in. Could you please deliver this tank to the farm and then get the truck to the garage?

I dunno what we were thinking when we started these repairs... We just went in and did the job, but when it was time to leave... We got stuck. Well, we managed to get out, but the construction rig is still there. Maybe you'd be able to pull it out.

The lighthouse keeper insists that the light went out when some bearded man in a robe was trying to use his lighter. I think the bulb's just dead. We need a replacement from the trailer, and some tools too... Could you make the delivery?

We just wanted to see the beautiful countryside, but the power of nature proved to be too much for us. We're okay, but our trailer has been washed away to God knows where. All our worldly possessions are in there... Please help us get it back, or this'll be the end of the road for us.
I should've known not to take that shortcut... Hey buddy, I see you've got a powerful ride there. Could you tow my baby for me? She's all alone out there, covered in mud...

I was driving home from Aunt Amelia's when I lost control and went off the road. I managed to get out, but my car's still lying at the bottom of the lake. Could you please get it out for me? Maybe it's still salvageable.

Gas-guzzling generators are a thing of the past. We need to think of the future. Write this down: we need a fuel tank brought from the gas station, and don't forget to tell them that Gilbert sent you! What was I talking about? Oh, right. We've hit rock bottom!

This is the first time someone's returned our goods under warranty. We value our reputation, so we've decided to recall the whole batch of wood. I hope they still give us a five-star review. Could you deliver the batch for us?

Our pool is very popular with the tourists when it's hot out. The thing is, they cut off our water due to pipeline maintenance. We do need to fill the pool somehow. The only solution I see is getting it delivered in a tank. Please hurry before people start complaining!

This is a disaster! I can't possibly stop the presses and leave people without our local news! The driver shouldn't have taken that mountain route. Now our cellulose is scattered all over the place and is at risk of rotting. I need it brought here. Would you help me?

Everyone has secrets... even the ground. Our geologists have discovered a small chemical dump site in an old mine. That stuff isn't safe - it's poisoning the soil. Could you take it to the garage for now? We'll have it processed in a bit.

Whatever possessed me to take my boat out in this weather? I'd never have dropped the crates if the water wasn't so choppy. Luckily the supplies don't weigh a lot, so the crates are just floating there. Hey, could you see if some of them have washed up ashore?
You're so efficient! Here's a little something for your trouble. You can leave the rest to me. I'll have the pictures processed, do a bit of color correction, and submit them to the magazine.

Hey, buddy! We've got a prize pool set up for an upcoming race. Just keep in mind that half of the track is concrete, the other â dirt. You gotta work the throttle on this one, but don't overdo it! You wouldn't want to run yourself into a ditch wheels-up.

Now that we're done literally putting out fires, it's time to tackle our orders. The first client needs us to take these logs to his lonely little house. He promises to pay well if we make it in time. Oh, and you're free to take our trailer to make things faster.

cargo_needed: 2× Bricks; 1× Metal Planks; 2× Bags; 2× Container Small
descriptionText: A tower on one of our historical landmarks collapsed because of the rain. We're requesting help delivering construction supplies. The mayor's office will reward you handsomely.

displayName: Ashes to Ashes, Water to Soil
descriptionText: You helped us investigate the source of the fire earlier. Now we need to make sure all the fires have been put out. We've got a water delivery job for you. Interested?

The loggers borrowed our service trailer, and now we can't keep up with all the maintenance work at the port. And, as luck would have it, all our drivers are busy! Could you do us a solid and get that trailer back?

I just wanted to spend the weekend high in the mountains, but ended up stuck in the mud instead. I've spent all this time waiting for someone to help me get my trailer back home... oh! Maybe you could do the job?

Hi there. Name's Frank. I'm from Ireland. I took a delivery job in the area but got a bit distracted while driving. Ended up damaging my engine. The plugs are fine, the distributor connector too. But the T-belt got jacked up. Could you give me a lift to the warehouse?

Well, this job requires extra speed and dedication. We need to have this bridge fixed, like, yesterday. Considering the urgency, I guess performing a barrel roll on a plane would be a more reasonable demand than this. But, uh... could you help?
I'm a hunter. A lot of my snares are in a sorry state, and I also need some parts for my car. We're not going anywhere until we get the supplies. I'll compensate you if you help me out.

Dammit, I've just about had it with this mountain! So many landslides... a simple cleanup won't cut it anymoreâwe need to make the road safe. Could you deliver some concrete blocks and other supplies to the site?
Half the work's done, but we still need to deal with the burned logs. You'll need a special vehicle for this part. It's a decent job with decent pay.

The orders are still rolling in. This time, the guys from the stables are offering us a hefty sum to help build some stalls for their shiny new mustangs. They're gonna expand their horseback-riding operation. This is a top-priority order!

Our hay reserves have started to rot because of the flood, and the driver who was supposed to get us a fresh batch got stuck halfway here. We need to act fast to keep our people fed and our animals healthy. Could you give us a hand?

Our fuel delivery driver decided to take a shortcut through the mountains, but lost his way and got his tank stuck in a crevice. We had to do an emergency evac for the guy, but his tank is still up there. Could you tow it here for us?

Greetings, traveler! I decided to take a shortcut across these mountains, but a pile of rocks and some puddles landed my vehicle in deep water. It's a truck, not a submarine, so now I'm left waiting for someone to rescue me.

Electricity costs way too much around here, so I prefer to heat with firewood. I've got a pretty big stockpile for now, but it might not be enough to get me through the winter. Could you deliver a couple of logs to me?

What a nightmare! This cliff's been here for hundreds of years. Now look at all the rubble and broken pitons all over the road... it's been 127 minutes since the emergency service was called, but those guys don't seem to be in a hurry to do their job. Could you help us out?

Tourism is flourishing, which is always a good thing. It also means more work for us. We need to deliver some logs to the two new guesthouses. Chop-chop! The sooner you do it, the sooner they can start renting out the properties.

Wooo, that was quite a race! I'm still out of breath, to be honest. Uh, could we keep the details of this rally between us? And I'd appreciate some help with my car. As you can see, you win some, you lose some...

Who could've known the road right next to the fields would get ruined like this? It's never happened before, but here we go again! Sheesh... mind helping an old farmer out of the dirt? I'll make it worth your while, I promise!

cargo_needed: 3× Vehicles Spare Parts; 1× Wooden Planks; 1× Barrels
descriptionText: We need the service center upgraded as soon as possible. Since everyone is in such a rush to get ready for tourist season, things keep breaking, and it's the closest shop qualified to keep our equipment up and running. We're counting on you!
There's work to be done! We need living quarters and some equipment for our loggers. Please deliver everything on the list. We promise you a handsome reward.

cargo_needed: 1× Potato; 1× Potato; 1× Potato; 1× Potato; 1× Potato; 1× Potato
descriptionText: With great power comes great responsibility. After harvesting a bumper crop like that, we need to get the bagged potatoes delivered to our customers. People need our potatoes, so everyone's counting on you.

The beavers' reaction to this bad weather was immediate. Don't get me wrong, they're pretty cool animals, but we've got enough on our plate as it is. Please help us deal with the flood damage on the farm. We'll pay you well.

cargo_needed: 1× Service Spare Parts; 1× Service Spare Parts; 1× Solar Panel; 1× Solar Panel
descriptionText: As meteorologists say, get the most out of good weather while it's here. Considering the rising cost of electricity and the recent sunny spell, we've decided to install solar panels in two areas. Now we just need to get them there. Do you think you're up for the job?

See that field? Grab a tractor and plow it. Get that done, and I'll give you some seeds. Or don'tâbut then you ain't gettin' jack. You sow the seeds, you get potatoes. Bring those to me, and I'll pay you. Now move it! I haven't got all day.

You've proven to be a deft hand at potato farming. Do you think you could do the same with soybeans? The soil here is very fertile, not like the stuff on Mars. I think you'll be fine. So what do you say?
Our company has been made aware of the additional fire hazards during the stormy season. We need you to inspect the area. Your efforts will be well compensated.
The authorities need us to check three ancient castles in the area to determine the best routes after all this bad weather. The job's simple and pays well. Are you up for it?

This is a disaster! Due to the lack of rain, the water levels in the region are so low, we're on the verge of a drought! How are people supposed to farm like this? To make matters worse, the pipeline broke down too. We need water right away! Please, we'll make it worth your while!

cargo_needed: 1× Vehicles Spare Parts; 1× Barrels; 1× Crate Large
descriptionText: Everyone needs support in these trying times, especially the unlucky tourists. Please deliver a relief package to their camps. You'll be compensated fairly.
The local geologists are requesting a water-level survey of our crossings. We need you to visit all the sites. You'll be compensated.

Hi! I'm Daggett. Me and my brother Norbert got tasked with returning a haystack those thieving beavers stole from the forester's house. So here's the plan: I call for help, Norb watches the stack, and you help with the delivery. Sound good?

Hey, buddy! We hold amateur races here. The last racer was in such a rush to win, he drove off the mountain right after he finished. He did set a record, though. You up for beating it? Safely, of course.

Hey there! Name's Jim. I'm in charge of building an oil rig here, and that's no mean feat. We could really use your help. To start off, could you check why in the world the crane trailer's not here yet?

Hey there. I'm Clint, the lighthouse keeper. Please help a guy out! Some important cargo got stuck in a gorge on its way to the lighthouse. It's not going anywhere unless someone gets it out, and I need it to keep the lighthouse running. Could you lend me a hand?

I'm the deputy head engineer and the construction crew chief on this site. You can't pass through here, so you'd better go back. But, if you're actually willing to help, please bring us some cements and metal beams. We can't do anything without them.
Hey buddy! We need your assistance ASAP. There's a damaged pipe in our area that needs replacing. Any chance you'd be willing to make the trip and get us a new pipe? We'd really appreciate it.

Welcome to Harbor! Our company works with the Canadian Coast Guard, and they've requested an initial inspection of the coastline. We need an expeditor who knows what they're doing. All expenses are gonna be covered. You up for the job?

Hello! We had a trailer stocked with mountaineering equipment ferried over to the port, but it still needs to be delivered to our center. Which is not something we can do on our own, so that's where you come in. Help us out, eh?

You're not gonna believe what just happened! I decided to take a shortcut across this lake, because I was so sure the ice could take the weight of my carâbut it started cracking! Now I'm stuck, and I really need to get out before my ride goes under. Help me out, eh?

Hey, did you notice our town's development efforts yet? We're building new houses for people, and we could use your help to deliver some planks. All our contractors refuse because of weather conditions. Give us a hand, eh?
Let's cut to the chaseâwe need two metal beams and four metal rolls delivered to the port. We'll pay you by the click. The job's nothing special, but it still needs done. You up for it?

Whadda y'at, fella? Want a cut of that oil money? Well, all you have to do is deliver some large pipes for the oil line to our guys so that we can amp up extraction. It'll be worth your while, promise!

We need some consumables and wooden planks to clear a rockslide in the eastern part of the area. The only way around it lies through the Forbidden Plateau. Be careful - they say whoever sets foot there will be cursed by evil spirits.

It's a disaster! The incident with that container carrier can lead to regrettable pollution of the nearshore zone. The vessel was transporting some special chemicals. We need to search the coastline and retrieve the cargo ASAP!

Hey there, buddy! We've got a problem. The bridge isn't ready yet, but people still need to get to the other side somehow. A temporary crossing would do the trickâjust need the supplies to build it. Could you get them to us if you have the time?
Hello! We're almost out of fuel, so I need you to get me a couple of barrels to keep our clients well-supplied. It's not something we can handle on our own, unfortunately. Will you take the job?

Hello! At this point, it's almost a tradition for our lab techs to race to Everton to alert the authorities about yet another Earth-bound comet discovered by Dr. Randall. Oh, there's another one! Would you like to join the race?

The next step is moving the drill unit and some other equipment from the old quarry. Fair warning: roads are covered in ice, and a little birdie told me there are tons of cameras around. Don't get a speeding ticket.

displayName: The Woes of a Construction Worker
descriptionText: Hey there, traveler! We urgently need some construction materials to finish this bridge. Could you get them for us? I hear you've got the skills, and I'm sure things will go a lot faster with your help.

Hey, friend! We need your help at the docks. Our boss, Mr. Cameron, told us to hurry up and fix a ship in the dockyard, but we're all out of spare parts. Could you give us a hand and deliver a batch of parts from the docks?

Hello! I'm back with another request now that the lighthouse has been patched up. I had some parts delivered to the port, and I'd appreciate it if you could get them for me. The lighthouse restoration efforts are still a work in progress.

cargo_needed: 1× Crate Large; 1× Crate Large; 1× Crate Large
descriptionText: We've received an emergency call from John Cabot, the owner of one of the trapped sailing vessels. He says the ice shifted, damaged the hulls of all three boats, so they're in urgent need of some parts. Can you handle the delivery?

Hey bud! We're in big trouble. One of the pipelines is badly damaged, to the point that it could leave the locals without any water unless we replace the leaky part. I've been told you're a great driver. Could you handle the delivery before it's too late?
Lots of machinery at the new plant needs fuel to operate uninterrupted. It's our job to provide it, and it's yours to safely get it to the plant. Mind the greasy roads, eh? And give it your all!

To get rid of this rockslide, the workers are going to need two pallets of planks from the sawmill. You can get around the roadblock through the gorge down below, but watch outâthere have been a few Sasquatch sightings in that area. Maybe the rockslide was his doing?

Hey there, traveler! I used to spend my winters down south, but this year, the urgent foundation repairs have kept me here. And I'm 65, I'll have you know. Hey, since you drive, could you get me some cement, eh?

I've got a job for you, and let me tell you upfrontâit's not gonna be easy. A cargo ship got into an accident nearby. We gotta to act fast, before the haul sinks to the bottom of the sea. The government requested the goods be recovered ASAP.

The authorities have already dispatched someone to inspect our bridge and make sure it's up to code, as all key infrastructure should be. By the time he gets here, our bridge needs to be at 100%, so we don't have any time to lose! We need supplies.

Okay, we've got one last but very important thing to take care offâget an offshore mooring anchor made. The new metalworks will need some special containers to complete that order, and that's where you come in. Hurry up, okay?

Well, looks like we've got another rockslide. The team will need two crates of spare parts to clear the way. You can get there if you go straight over the mountain, but they say there are wolves in the area. Try not to lay on the horn if you don't want them to rip off your license plate.

We're in the home stretch now. That giant anchor needs to be moved to the port for rigging to the platform. It's a tricky job, so it'll take a hot minute. Be extra careful with this one, all right? We're counting on you.
The oil rig needs a special flexible drillstem to run, and they have it ready at the new plant. We're also short on fuel for our tower. Could you get it for us?

We still need two shipments of concrete slabs and four shipments of brick to finish our metalworks, according to the budget. But, once that's done, it'll be time to kick back and relax! Could you grab us something to drink while you're at it?
The only way to reach Tidal right now is via ice crossing, but it's just not safe. A pontoon would work much better. We're going to need two metal rolls and two bundles of long, wood beams.
Welcome to our base! This place is gaining popularity by the day, which means we're going to need more fuel and supplies. But, as they say, the more the merrier, eh?

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks Medium; 2× Wooden Planks Medium
descriptionText: Hello there! We have a major issue on our handsâan avalanche damaged the bridges next to the mountaineering center, cutting it off from the rest of the world. We need to restore that transport link ASAP if we want any chance to get supplies and save the people out there. Help us out, eh?

This weather station is in dire need of maintenance. The equipment is outdated, and some things really need to be replaced. We need supplies to get the station up and running again. Could you handle the delivery?

After carefully considering the fuel consumption rate, we've come to the conclusion that the oil platform is missing eight more fuel barrel pallets. Therefore, taking into account the interests of oil workers, we need you to deliver those barrels to us.

What a disaster! Luckily, they've already evacuated the people, but our special delivery's still there. We have two undamaged containers by that shipwreck, and we need them delivered to the port despite any thin ice you might encounter. Will you take the job?

The event was a lot of fun! The clean-up, not so much. We've collected the garbage, but disposing of it without special tech doesn't seem feasible. Could you drop the containers off at the port if you've got a minute? We'd be much obliged.

So, we're waiting for some supplies we need to build a bridge here. You'll be paid on delivery for transportation, as well as for your driving service. Present company shall not be liable for the damages sustained by the cargo during transport. Are you up for the job?

Hey, bud! I wanted to capture the beauty of nature, so I took a canvas, an easel, and some paintsâset out to find the best spot. Thing is, the road was so hammered that I lost control of my car, and now it's stuck in the middle of nowhere. Could you tow it back to my house?
We're in a bit of bind here. A rockslide has blocked the main road to the ferry station. We need your help getting some metal beams there to clear the way. Don't worry, we'll pay you for the trouble!

cargo_needed: 2× Container Small; 3× Vehicles Spare Parts; 2× Wooden Planks Medium; 3× Bags
descriptionText: Hey. We're on a tight deadline here, and we need a buttload of supplies to finish the bridge in time. Tricky part is getting to the construction site, but we hear you're an expert. Think you could handle this?

Hey there, traveler! Could you help me tow my truck? It's stuck, and it refuses to start in these freezing temperatures. My destination is a few miles awayâor, well, the number's a bit higher if you're counting in clicks. So, give me a lift, eh?

Greetings from the local timbermen! As you might've noticed, a pile of rubble is blocking the logging camp's access road. Our vehicles can't get anywhere like this! We'll need some consumables to clear the way. Could you help with that?

displayName: Snow, Trailer and Two Wood Planks
descriptionText: Hey there, bud! I've got a trailer stuck not far from here, and it has the tools I need to do some home repairs. We're also short a couple good planks for interior work. Do you think you could deliver the supplies to us?

Hey there! My buddy borrowed my trailer a while ago, but now his car's in the shop, and he can't bring my stuff back. He's willing to pay for delivery, though. One good deed deserves another, eh. I really need that trailer. Do you think you could fetch it for me? My bud's house isn't far.

This season, our company has opened a new scenic overlook by the lake. It's a great tourist attraction, but we need to get ready for the influx. According to our estimates, we'll need more logs, spare parts, and fuel. Can you get all of that to us?

cargo_needed: 1× Vehicles Spare Parts; 1× Vehicles Spare Parts; 1× Vehicles Spare Parts
descriptionText: According to the list of participants, three of the trailers are yet to arrive. Luckily, we were able to get in contact with their ownersâturns out they need a bit of help getting here. Could you handle that for us?
This is dispatch! We've had the outer rock layer collapse in the northern tunnel. No casualties. We need a drilling rig and a repair van to resume work. Do you copy?

cargo_needed: 4× Wooden Planks; 2× Logs Short; 2× Barrels Oil; 2× Barrels Oil
