descriptionText: Our company has been hired to build several rentals, and the deadline is coming up. Most of them are ready, but we still need to finish two houses. Missing the deadline is not an option, because they've been booked in advance. Help us out, eh?

cargo_needed: 2× Service Spare Parts Special; 2× Container Large
descriptionText: The mining operation is in full swing, but the deeper we drill, the more spare parts we go through. We keep finding all sorts of holes in the bedrock. We'd appreciate it if you could get us some new supplies before the ones we have run out.

Hey, buddy! We're absolutely swamped. There's so much work to be done with the Fishing Fest coming up. We need more planks and logs, like, yesterday, if we don't want our guests to sit on the ground. Help us out, eh? The festival's at stake here!

Hey there! I'm a paraglider and I love exploring the vast, open skies. But even I have to land sometimes, especially when I run out of fuel. Could you do me a solidâget me some fuel and spare parts? I'll make it worth your while!

displayName: A Timberman's Work is Never Done
cargo_needed: 2× Service Spare Parts; 2× Vehicles Spare Parts
descriptionText: Our camp has been working overtime lately. Everyone needs wood. That's why our equipment has been wearing out at a faster rate. We're in desperate need of spare parts. We need to keep this operation running!

We've got a non-delivery of two giant pipes, and they're yet to be found. The pipes weren't secured properly during transport, so they fell off somewhere by the dam. All you need to do is follow the river and bring our cargo back.

Mining always generates waste that needs to be properly disposed of, so we need to send all this trash for recycling before they slap us with a fine. Take it to the warehouse at the local port for us, eh?

displayName: On the Other Side of a Pipeline
descriptionText: You never know what you're going to find in an old water main. There's some sort of mushroom growing on the sides, and we've found a live turtle in one of the branches! It's high time to replace that pipeline. Mind delivering a pipe for us?

The plant's been shut down, and we're scrapping it for construction materials. We've got two pallets of bricks that need to be transported to the town warehouse. Feel free to use our plant's trailerâthough you'll have to get it from a worker's house by the river.

Hello there! The paragliders have requested a prototype exploration unit be delivered to the northern tower to ensure their safety. It's going to improve cell network coverage, which is crucial in emergencies. Would you mind helping us with this life-saving job?

Hey! Some help here? I drove my truck out onto the ice to do some fishing, but the weight proved to be a bit too much, so now it's stuck there. Could you tow it to the trailer park for me? I'm good for it, promise.

cargo_needed: 1× Crate Large; 1× Crate Large; 1× Crate Large
descriptionText: Due to recent weather conditions, our town council has issued essential supply kits to help keep people warm. The problem is, we don't have enough council-owned vehicles to distribute those kits. Our townspeople need your help. Will you take the job?

Hey there! We've got a bunch of chem waste barrels lying around at the old plant. They need to be moved to the port for processing before we're fined for endangering the environment. Care to help us with some recycling?

Hey, bud! We've been riding this track on our snowmobiles, and I bet you won't be able to outrace us. It's a difficult course with a snowy ravine up ahead. Wanna take the dare and show us what you've got? There's money riding on this!

displayName: Keep Your Cool on Thin Ice
descriptionText: Hey, anyone else want to join our ice race? The track isn't an easy one, so any slip-up could cost you a trip to the repair shop, once you've fished your car out of the ice, that is. But what's a little property damage for a chance to win the prize money, eh? Sing up today!

We need to build a bridge traversing the mountains. I know it's a big ask, but our logistical needs cannot be satisfied without it. It goes without saying that the cliffs will only make matters worse, so we have some meticulous planning ahead of us. Here's hoping you can help us out.

Hey there! I had some provisions delivered, but couldn't get them all the way to the watchtower by myself. The road isn't the best, to put it mildly. Could you help me tow the supply trailer to the tower? These supplies will make my job so much more bearable.

Hey there! We've run into a bit of trouble. One of our drivers took a wrong turn trying to get around a collapsed bridge and ended up in a swamp. The truck wasn't damaged, but it's stuck there. We need it back in the city ASAP. Can you help?
Hello! I'm kind of in a bind here: I lost control of my car, it turned over, and now I can't make it home. The car needs to be towed. Can I count on your help?

Hey! We need you to get a trailer from the mine to the port for us. What's inside? That's for us to know and for you to find out. We need the trailer safe and sound, so be careful on the way. Just get it to the port, and everything will be A-okay!
Our residents have been practically cut off from the rest of the world by this landslide. You'd really make our work easier if you could help us out.

Greetings! My name's Garrett and I work at the local quarry. We've run into an issueâwith the old bridge damaged, logistics have been compromised. That bridge was the only connecting point. We'd appreciate it if you could build us a new one!

displayName: Backing Out of a Dead End
descriptionText: You know, sometimes you just make poor calls. Take me: I decided to take a shortcut through here and ended up stuck. And now I need help to get my car out and take it to the mine. The clock is ticking!
Hey, so I got myself into a spot of trouble. My vehicle refused to cooperate on the way down, so I had to ditch the trailer. Do you think you can retrieve it and get it to the container warehouse?

Ah, I messed up. As you can see, I ran my car into a swamp. The wheels got stuck, and now it won't budge. I gotta admit, I can't get out of this on my own. Could you help me tow my car? My house isn't far.
The main traffic artery of our region has been blocked! Please help us clear the obstruction and save the isolated town.

One of our most important routes has been jeopardized by an accident in the tunnel. The whole system could end up paralyzed unless we deal with this, and fast. We need your help to restore everything on time and prevent a full-blown disaster.

The plant is this close to shutting down because we haven't received the necessary equipment. We need it here yesterday, or all the lines will have to be deactivated. Could you lend us a hand with this emergency?

Hey there! We have a situation and no way to deal with it on our own. We need to clear the way for our construction equipmentâdeliver a couple of bags of cement, some sand, and an equipment trailer.

Hey there! We've run into an issue with a supply run. The trailer got stuck in a river crossing, and the car itself couldn't make it out either. We need the supplies delivered to the mine, stat, to avoid significant revenue loss. Could you help?

Hello! We've prepared a shipment of wood to be delivered to the port, but unfortunately, we have neither the equipment nor the manpower for the job. Could you help us deliver the goods? We'd be much obliged!

cargo_needed: 2× Service Spare Parts; 1100× Water; 3× Crate Large
descriptionText: Time is money, and we're in a bind right now. We've got several important shipments waiting to be delivered. Delays can result in major loss of revenue here. We need an experienced driver we can rely on. You in?

cargo_needed: 2× Bags 2; 2× Bricks; 2× Wooden Planks; 1× Pipes Small
descriptionText: Hello! We have several important delivery contracts with various towns, but none of our drivers are currently available. You have a reputation as a dependable contractor, so we're willing to hire you for these jobs.

We own a burned-down warehouse that has to be demolished. All the rubble and scrap metal needs to be carted away to a recycling plant. It's a rough job, but we'll make it worth your while if you can do it.

Hey there! We're getting ready for a big construction project, and delivering supplies for the hangars is part of our contract. We really hope you can help us out. We're on a deadline, so this is urgent!

We have an emergency. The Lighthouse is out of commission, and the ships are going in blind right now. We've been tasked with delivering repair supplies, but the deadline is tight. We need someone to deliver all the materials, fast.

cargo_needed: 1× Logs Medium; 2× Wooden Planks; 1× Container Small
descriptionText: Hey there! We need some help building a new forester's hut. This is a crucial project meant to improve our foresters' working conditions. Could you deliver the supplies for us and help with the construction?

cargo_needed: 1× Barrels; 1× Solar Panel; 1× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: Our watchtowers need some crucial supplies. Without them, our ability to control our territory will be severely impaired. This contract includes deliveries to several key facilities. Are you ready for this undertaking?

Hey, we need your help. Our drivers keep getting stuck in mud or wasting time taking detours. We need to know which routes are safe and which ones are a one-way ticket to disaster. Check the roads for us and find the best ones, okay?

Hey there! We've run out of water at the trailer park, and that really makes our folks' lives difficult. We've found a trailer full of water and other supplies, but delivering it is an issue as well. Could you help us out? I don't know what we're going to do without water!

Hello! We've run into a minor issue with our boats. They need maintenance, and we don't have the spare parts. The warehouse does, but we can't fetch them on our own. Could you do a delivery run for us?

Hey there! I live alone in the forest, and I need fuel to last me through the winter. My house is quite isolated, so getting deliveries out here is a bit of a challenge. I won't be able to keep working without the fuel. Could you help me out?

cargo_needed: 1× Wooden Planks; 1× Wooden Planks; 1× Wooden Planks
descriptionText: Hiya! We've got a small problem at the holiday camp. The shipment of planks we're expecting is late, and we really need it for repair work. We'd appreciate it if you could help get the planks to us!

People rarely visit this island. Truth be told, I can barely remember what it's like, seeing strangers. The soil here is depleted, but they can't get my fertilizer order to me because this place is so hard to reach. Could you help me with that?
As a former racer, I'm always on the lookout for challenging courses. But I like them when they're right next to my humble abode... Could you check out this course for me? Show 'em how it's done!
My neighbors and I used to enjoy fishing and bragging about our catches to each other, but now one of them has gone no-contact! Could you check on him, see if he's okay? He's old and he lives alone.

displayName: The Start of a Long Journey
descriptionText: The railway bridge is a key link in our logistics chain, but it has suffered damage and we have no tools to clear the rubble. We need equipment ASAP! Do you think you can deliver a trailer with some spare parts to us? The sooner we get started, the sooner we can restore this route.

displayName: The End of a Long Journey
cargo_needed: 2× Junk Open; 2× Junk Closed; 2× Railway; 2× Metal Planks; 2× Bags
descriptionText: Clearing the rubble was just step 1. Now we need to get some containers and deliver the rubbish to a recycling plant. Once the area is all cleaned up, we'll be able to get the materials for the new bridge here. We'd better get this done fast to restore our logistics!

Hello! We need you to deliver a water boiler to the hotel cluster. Both the route and the cargo are tricky, but you always come out on top of tasks like this. Could you help? We know we can trust you.
Hello! The hotel cluster has put in a big order of supplies they need to build a water tower. You have a knack for dealing with jobs like this with speed and quality, so we're counting on you!

This place once bustled with humming saws, the smell of wood, and dozens of trucks coming and going. The sawmill is still in operation, but the equipment's outdated. We want to give it a face-lift. If you've got the time, we'd be much obliged for your help!

This gate welcomed rangers for generations, but now it's all but a tilting pile of logs. The park seems soulless like this. We need supplies to restore the park entrance. Let's give this place a fresh start!

cargo_needed: 2× Logs Short; 1× Logs Medium; 1× Logs Long; 2× Logs Medium
descriptionText: Winter is almost here, and we're running out of logs. We need to restock our warehouses ASAP to make sure there's enough fuel and construction materials for all our facilities. Could you get us a shipment of logs, please?

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks Medium; 2× Logs Medium; 2× Container Small; 2× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: We need various supplies delivered to the scout camp. The living quarters need planks and logs, and the riverside building needs containers and various consumables. The terrain isn't difficult, but this job requires precision. Are you up for it?
We have a bit of a problem. Our water-pumping system is out of commission, which means we'll be in trouble if a fire breaks out. We urgently need supplies to fix the system. Could you help?

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks; 2× Wooden Planks Medium; 1× Wooden Planks Long; 4× Bags; 4× Bags 2
descriptionText: We've seen time and again that you're a reliable person. Right now, we need supplies delivered to the Forest Service base. Winter is comingâwe need everything ready before it arrives.

Winter can be unpredictable, so it's best to prepare in advance. We need to stockpile a bunch of supplies so we're ready for whatever comes. Here's a listâthese things will help us get through the cold season without too much trouble.

cargo_needed: 1× Sensory Buoy; 1× Sensory Buoy; 1× Sensory Buoy; 1× Sensory Buoy
descriptionText: There was an incident during our data buoy delivery: the trailer got overturned and water carried the cargo away. We won't be able to find it without special equipment, and a hands-on search would take too much time. Could you help us get the buoys back?

cargo_needed: 1× Service Spare Parts; 1× Service Spare Parts; 1× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: Yeah... The review is done, and the news isn't good... We've got washed-out roads, landslides, rockslides... First things first, we should deal with the fallen trees since they're blocking important traffic. And no word from Jerry, again. Will you help?

This bridge has been dismantled due to some design errors, and now our logistics are a bust. We need construction materials to rebuild. If you get us everything we need, we'll be able to finish the job fast and restore normal communications!

Railroad trouble always means loss of revenue, and at this point it's reached exorbitant proportions. We need to replace the worn-out parts of the tracks ASAP, or nothing will get delivered at all. If you have the time, we'd really appreciate your help.

I've got a job for you. One of the key trading depots keeps experiencing blackouts. We've ordered some new power transformers but can't get them to the destination... You could say we're like a plumber whose house has a leak. Could you help us?

Hey there! We've had lots of heavy rains recently, so the forest routes need to be checked for damage. I usually ask Jerry, but he's busy with something important, again. Could you drive around the area and inspect the routes?

Hey buddy! I got myself into a hot mess here. I thought I could get through, somehow, but the mud said no. Now my trailer's stuck, and they're waiting for this cargo at the railway station. I'd be forever grateful if you could tow it there!

Hi! I have a bit of a problem: my fuel tank got stuck in the swamp. I decided to take the main route, but it was a tall order considering the trailer, so here we are. But we're up to our ears in work to deal with the tank ourselvesâcould you help us get it to the warehouse?
Our watermill is a bit wonky and in dire need of repairs. All the required supplies should be by the hotel cluster. Could you deliver them to the mill when you have the time?

So I thought I'd check out a new route. I drive here often but figured this way might be shorter. Well, it wasn't, because now my car's stuck here as part of the landscape. If you have a powerful tow truck, could you help me get back to base?

I was surveying the area when I lost control of the car and it went careening away. Not sure if it was the bumpy road or my own fault, but I can't get the car out on my own. I'd be much obliged if you help me out!

Hey, you didn't happen to drive past an old village at the marsh, did you? I noticed an abandoned logging trailer there, and it looks like it could still be put to good use. Could you pick it up and bring it to the sawmill?

We're in a spot of trouble here. We ordered some slatestone from Kazakhstan, but the shipping company has refused to deliver it all the way to us. The cargo is waiting at a railway station. Could you pick it up and bring it here?

Greetings! This is bad. We're all out of winter reserves, and there's about to be a cold wave. One of our neighbors has agreed to share his supplies, but I can't transport them on my own. Can I count on you?
Hey, now that the water reservoir is fine, do you think you could fill our tanks? Just in case a fire starts somewhere...

The car's here, but we seem to be missing the paper we ordered. We need it at the scout camps for an important art project. The scouts are counting on this delivery. We'd be so grateful if you could help!

Ah, hello! I've invented a marvelous fertilizer! If everything goes according to plan, my garden will be full of wonders soon! But running deliveries is a job for peons. So help me out with that, would you? For science!
There are so many landslides and rockslides in the area that we just can't keep up with them... But we're prioritizing the ones on the main roads. Could you help us out if you have the time?
An experienced kayaker is looking for someone to race, and he doesn't care how you traverse the river... Do you catch my drift?

We're testing our cars' cross-country abilities here. It's just the kind of experience you could always use in our area. If you want to test yours too, be our guest. We'll even help you out with repairs if you do better than us!

displayName: Groundwork for a Hydro Power Plant
descriptionText: We're in the final stages of constructionâjust a bit more, and the hydro power plant will be finished. But without a tower crane, we won't be able to assemble the last parts. The crane's at the port. We need it delivered to the construction site.

cargo_needed: 1× Wooden Planks Medium; 1× Solar Panel; 2× Bricks; 2× Bags
descriptionText: All our weather towers are experiencing issues, but these two have it the worst. They're our priority in repairs, and we need you to deliver some materials to get them up and running again.

Hey friend! I'm in trouble: my scouting trailer got stuck, and I have to deliver it to the lookout point. I can't make it on my own, so if you've got a bit of time, could you pull it out and tow it to the destination?

Hello, friend! We've got a problem: a construction trailer got stuck in mud on the way to us. We need your help getting it out and towing it to the construction site. The terrain is tricky, but I'm sure you'll be fine!

displayName: Preparing the Hydro Plant for Launch
descriptionText: The construction work at the hydro power plant is almost finished, but we're still missing some construction materials. We need them delivered to the final stage construction site. Hope you can help with that.

cargo_needed: 2× Bags 2; 1× Solar Panel; 2× Wooden Planks; 1× Metal Planks
descriptionText: Time to deal with the other two weather towers. We're still working on restoring them, and we need supplies to make them operational. Please deliver the supplies as soon as you can.

Hey, buddy! Seems like I underestimated how powerful the currents are when I tried to take the shortcut through the river crossing. Luckily, the trailer got stuck on the rocks, but all my cargo got carried away. Can you help me retrieve the trailer and search the banks for my lost goods?
Hey, friend! My car broke down and died halfway to the northeast weather tower. I don't think I'll make it there without your help. Could you get me out and give me a lift?

We're this close to finishing the power plant! We just need some final materials for the main building. That building is the heart of the plant, so it's crucial to get it ready for all the plant's equipment.
We're done with the power plant, except for one final step: delivering transformers to the transformer station. This is the key to connecting the plant to the grid. Please help us finish the job!

cargo_needed: 1× Logs Long; 1× Logs Medium; 2× Wooden Planks Medium
descriptionText: This place attracts a lot of tourists and locals, but it's bound to fall into disarray without proper maintenance. We need fresh logs to patch up the buildings and a power generator to keep the lights on. Will you help us preserve this landmark?

cargo_needed: 2× Service Spare Parts; 3× Vehicles Spare Parts; 2× Wooden Planks Medium
descriptionText: The technical issues at our logging site are getting in the way of our work. We need you to get us all the necessary spare parts along with a service trailer. That should help us resume operations and get back to logging faster.

cargo_needed: 2× Junk Open; 2× Junk Closed; 2× Metal Planks; 2× Vehicles Spare Parts; 2× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: One of our transmission towers went down because of a design error. We need supplies to rebuild it. Please help us with the delivery so we can restore the power supply and avoid any more problems.
Hello! The helipad is all out of fuel, and at this rate, our helicopters will end up unable to fly. We need a tank and some oil barrels. Please deliver the order as soon as possible.

We need help with an important delivery: some car spare parts should be taken to the logistics center, and several trailers currently scattered across the map should be brought back. We're sure you can help us deal with this in no time!

Our plant produces concrete slabs, but right now we're in serious trouble. Our equipment has malfunctioned, and there's a power outage at the facility. We'd be able to get back to work if you could deliver us all the supplies we need along with a generator.

cargo_needed: 2× Metal Planks; 2× Blocks; 2× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: A mistake made by construction workers has made the bridge across that ravine unusable, but it's the only way to reach the power plant. Work at the plant had to be halted until the bridge gets rebuilt. We need supplies ASAP to speed up the process.
Hey, friend! Our truck got stuck on the side of the road out in the boonies. We need to get it out, and fast. It's gonna stay there forever if you don't help us. Are you up for it?
Hey there! A rockslide has blocked the road to the concrete plant. We need to clear it ASAP to restore logistics in the area. Could you help us remove the roadblock?

displayName: Through the Eyes of a Scout
descriptionText: We have a large territory under our purview, so sometimes things slip through the cracks. We need you to drive by certain spots and check on the infrastructure. Rain might've washed out the roads or wind might've damaged the buildings. Please tell us if you see anything dire.

Here's the deal: a trailer carrying concrete blocks got stuck on the way to the northwest weather station. It won't budge, and the blocks need to be delivered to several clients. Could you help me out and then bring the trailer back to the precast concrete plant?

Hey, I could use some help here. I'm drilling a water well on my grounds, but the final step requires some pipes and a water pump. I'd be much obliged if you delivered me all that stuff so I could finish the job.

Oh no! One of the trees fell right on the road, and just when the loggers finally took a lunch break, too. No time to wait for their break to end, we need your help now! Could you get us a tool trailer?

Ah, good thing you happened by! Could you drive to the fish farm to the east of here and bring us the special pool cleaning equipment, as well as a couple of barrels of cleaning solution? The people there will be expecting you.
We're having some trouble with an uncertified pump. It was delivered to the helipad, and now we need to perform several tests and get it certified before it will be ready for use.
Hey friend! I'd like to rebuild my cabin, but I need logs for that. Could you help me with the delivery? I'll owe you one. It's not far, but the load is pretty heavy.
Our helicopter had to jettison some important cargo during a crash landing. We know where it dropped, approximately, but the landscape there is tricky. Please help us recover the cargo.
Hi! We've got an important job for you. Please check all the weather towers and make sure our equipment is in working order. And please don't take too long. We're counting on you!
Good afternoon! We're currently researching riverside soil stability. Please use this thumper to perform a comprehensive soil analysis. It will let us determine and prevent potential landslides.

We have our hands full with logging, but the higher-ups at the camp are demanding an update on the state of the adjoining roads. Can you drive around real quick, check if there's a fallen tree blocking one of the roads or something?

Hey there, traveler! We're trying to see who knows the trails around this mountain the best. The winner will be crowned The Mountain Trail Conqueror! Anyone is welcome to enter. Want to give it a shot?

Hey there! Our water extraction project is about to begin, but without the drilling trailer, we're dead in the water. We need you to deliver it to the siteâthe sooner it gets there, the sooner we can start drilling. Can you handle it?

Listen, we've got a bit of a situation here... One guy sold a trailer to the farm but couldn't deliver itâgot it buried deep in the swamp. Feel like earning a bit of cash? We need it pulled out and delivered to the address before it sinks for good.

displayName: The Long Way Through a Shortcut
descriptionText: Ah, I'm in a real bind... The bridge was a no-go, so I tried to cut through the swamp, and now my car's stuck up to its axles. If you can, please tow it to my workplaceâthere's no way I'm getting out of here on my own.

Well, I tried to save a couple of minutes and ended up losing several hours... I was driving back from my friend's farm, thought I could dash through a puddle, and now I'm stuck. Can you help tow me back home?
Ah, someone's abandoned their equipment at the foot of the hill again. The scouting trailer seems to be in one piece, just stuck and left. Can you tow it to the parking lot by the garage?

You've helped us out before, and now we're in a similar spot. The second site is ready for drilling, but the trailer still hasn't arrived. The crew is waiting, our equipment stands idle. You're our only hopeâplease get it over there.

What a day! I just finished a shooting session and thought I'd take a shortcut across the water to protect my suspension. Well, that didn't pan out since the car's now stuck in a swamp up to its headlights. I'd appreciate a tow before it starts sprouting moss.

Hello. I was doing some geological exploration for the future construction of a water towerâhad to get a couple soil samples. Unfortunately, my vehicle was pulled downhill on a turn and now it's stuck. Could you help pull it out?

cargo_needed: 2× Service Spare Parts; 2× Crate Large; 4× Fertilizer
descriptionText: Hey! The old field's overgrown with spruce trees, and the rocks are choking out the new sprouts. We need your help: please bring in the supplies, clear the land, and help us reclaim the field so it can bear fruit again!

displayName: Light at the End of the Tunnel
descriptionText: Good afternoon! There's been a collapse in the railway tunnel, and all traffic is completely stopped now. We need materials for the cleanup and reinforcing the structure. Without it, all transport will grind to a halt. Can you deliver everything we need?

The central farm is in a real bindâthe fertilizer and trailer are delayed, and all the equipment's just sitting idle. We needed someone reliable, and you were the first person we thought of. Can you get it all delivered on time? We're counting on you!

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks; 2× Metal Planks; 4× Fertilizer; 1× Solar Panel; 1× Solar Panel; 1× Solar Panel
descriptionText: Hey bud! The farm's buzzing with activity, and some of the greenhouses are already up, but we still need to install the solar panels and finish the rest of the buildings. If you can help with the delivery and construction, the farm will be running at full capacity again in no time!

cargo_needed: 1× Container Reefer; 1× Container Small; 1× Container Large; 1× Container Reefer
descriptionText: Hey, could you do us a favor? We need a few containers and some refrigeration units deliveredâone to the city warehouse, the other to the retreat. It's nothing complicated, just get them to their destinations. You're the most reliable driver we've got.

cargo_needed: 4× Fertilizer; 2× Crate Large; 3× Service Spare Parts; 1× Pipes Medium
descriptionText: Hey! Our plants survived the drought, the water's back on, but it's not enoughâthe seedlings are still weak. We urgently need fertilizer to revive them and get the farm's harvest back on track. Can you help us get the supplies before it's too late?

cargo_needed: 2× Metal Planks; 2× Metal Roll; 6× Bricks; 1× Chiller
descriptionText: Hey there! Our food factory is almost ready, but we could use your help to meet our final deadline. We're really hoping you can deliver all the necessary supplies for us to kick-start production.

The construction of our new boiler facility is in full swing, but the shipments are running late. We'll have to shut down production without those missing materials. If you can handle the delivery, you'll be saving the entire project.

cargo_needed: 2× Metal Planks; 2× Metal Roll; 2× Metal Planks; 2× Metal Roll
descriptionText: All right, time to move on to the next step. We've got the water, but now we need to distribute it! We have to build two water towersâone for the eastern fields and another for the western ones. If you can help us deliver the supplies, we'll get through the season without any drought for sure.

cargo_needed: 1× Logs Short; 1× Logs Medium; 1× Logs Short; 1× Logs Medium
descriptionText: Those last rains really did a number on our farmsâsome areas have been washed out and need repairs. We need you to haul some logs to rebuild the warehouses and outbuildings. You've always got a reliable rig ready to go!

Hey pal! We've got to get the mountain route back in shape: a stretch of the road has been damaged, and we need the repair supplies hauled right to the spot. Until it's fixed, the way to the other side of the region is blocked, and the crew's stuck waiting.

cargo_needed: 1× Container Large; 2× Concrete Slab; 1× Metal Planks
descriptionText: Hey friend! The bridge by the garage still isn't readyâsupplies got stuck somewhere, and without that connection, not a single truck can get through. It would be a huge help if you took on the delivery! We've just about given up hope waiting around here.

cargo_needed: 2× Junk Open; 2× Crate Large; 2× Junk Closed
descriptionText: Hey there! The tower by the road collapsed after the last stormâthere are piles of stone left that we can use to rebuild the temple. Please get us some empty containers, load up the usable blocks, and deliver them to the construction site.

cargo_needed: 2× Crate Large; 1× Service Spare Parts; 2× Wooden Planks
descriptionText: Hey, we need your help! The movie set is almost ready, but not all the materials for the props and set dressings have arrived on time. We need you to deliver them so we can continue shooting without delays and get the movie finished on schedule.

cargo_needed: 2× Wooden Planks; 4× Metal Roll; 2× Container Reefer
descriptionText: Hey, we've got a bit of an emergency here. The central warehouse is almost empty, and without new supplies, everything's going to grind to a halt. We need building supplies and a couple of freezers delivered to get things moving again. Think you can handle it?
Hey there! We could use your help: these equipment containers are needed at the sawmill and the old farm. It's a crucial delivery for our operationsâwithout it, everything has grinded to a halt.

Things seem to be falling apart here when you're not around. The sand for the east farm still hasn't been delivered, and the logs are waiting for transport to the west. You'll have to drive around a bit, but be carefulâthe road's no walk in the park. You in?

Hey there! The restoration efforts in the region are in full swing, but we need to make sure all the key facilities are operating properly. Please drive to the warehouse, the factories, and the train terminal to gather data for our progress report.
Hello! Our management is collecting data on mountain slope soil. We need you to drive to four seismic zones and take measurements. It will help with planning future projects in the area.
Management is asking for help in supplying several remote villages. The roads are in rough shape, but people live there year-round and depend on regular deliveries. We're counting on you.
Good afternoon! Our people at the watchtowers are running low on supplies, and it'll be tough for them to work without a restock. Can you help deliver everything they need?

Hey! I run a few small shops around here, and my storerooms are short on merchandise. I'd be really grateful if you could check this list and deliver what's needed. I just don't have the time to do it myself, and the roads aren't exactly in great shape right now.

Hey, things at the warehouse by the train station have ground to a halt. We've got burst pipes, and the equipment's acting up like an old steam engine. We won't get anywhere without repairs. Could you deliver the pipes and spare parts? You'd be a real lifesaver!

Hey there! We're running low on metal at the pipe warehouse, and without it, production will grind to a halt. We're doing whatever we can with the shortage, but there's just no way around it. Could you get us some supplies? It would be a huge help!
Heya! My cliffside house is built in a very scenic spot, but it's nearly impossible to get supplies up here on my own. Can you help me deliver the cargo? I'd be really grateful!

cargo_needed: 1× Service Spare Parts; 1× Service Spare Parts; 1× Crate Large
descriptionText: Hey! My car broke down just outside the city, but the orders still need to be dealt with. Could you deliver the cargo for me? I'm really stuck here without your help!

displayName: The Last Run Before the Cold
descriptionText: Listen, we've got another shortageâpeople are out of fuel and hay. We've got everything ready, it just needs to be delivered. The locations are hard to reach, especially that house by the cliff, but I know you can handle it.

Hey! The village is having power outages againâthe old panels are worn out, and the equipment's down without spare parts. We've ordered new solar panels and components, but there's no one to deliver them. Can you help the folks out?

Hey! There's been an accident on the tracks leading to our oil refinery, and the trains aren't running. We desperately need some fuel containers to keep the plant running. Can you help and deliver them yourself?
Hey, I need a hand here! The fuel storage is almost empty, and the garage is asking for an urgent freezer delivery. Without it, all work will come to a halt. Hope you've got time to help out.

Hey pal! I've got a farm here, and these waste containers are just getting in the way of everything. Can't manage it aloneâI need your help collecting them, loading them up, and hauling them far away. I'd be much obliged!
Listen, we have some leftover supplies at the construction site, and we decided to donate them to the warden nearby. Can you help transport them before someone steals everything?

Here's the thing... we need to check a section of track before we can send a train through. The rules say to do it on foot, but who's got the time? Take a drive down there, see if there's any warping on the rails.

Hey! Folks at the rail yard have come up with a challengeâyou need to drive across the platforms without falling off or getting stuck. Everyone keeps saying the route's impossible, but I'm sure you can prove them wrong.

It's not every day the railway services ask the road transport services for help. But this is an exception. We need to tow an engine from the bridge to the southern platform for refueling. A relief train driver will be waiting there.

displayName: The Gifts of the Sun: Basics
cargo_needed: 1× Metal Planks; 1× Bags; 1× Metal Planks; 1× Bags; 1× Metal Planks; 1× Bags; 1× Metal Planks; 1× Bags; 1× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: Welcome to the solar farm! We're in the home stretch nowâjust need to install 4 sections of solar panels to get this place humming. It's not back-breaking work, but the clock is ticking. We need metal beams and cement to get the ball rolling on the frames.

Welcome! We don't get many visitors in our village, especially driving rigs like yours. Since you're hereâmake yourself at home. By the way, could you help me patch up a huge hole in my cellar? Not for freeâI'll pay you!

Thank heaven I just replaced the brake pads on my car. They held up fine in the emergency, but the other parts weren't so lucky. Could you tow the thing and help me with the repairs? I'll make it worth your while!

Good thing no one was hurt in the disaster, but it's more than can be said for the region's economy. Still, we're lucky the entire train wasn't destroyed by the rockslide. There are 3 cars left that need to be moved to the railway warehouse for safekeeping.

displayName: The Gifts of the Sun: Theory
cargo_needed: 2× Solar Panel; 2× Solar Panel; 2× Solar Panel; 2× Solar Panel
descriptionText: On to the next stepâthe solar panels. This cargo is quite fragile and expensive, so it needs careful handling. We need 8 pallets. My crew will stand by so they can start mounting them on the frame right away. We'll be waiting for your delivery!

No one's safe from accidents like this. Thankfully, my truck made it through, but a big rock slammed into the trailer's side. You can see the result... Could you help me recover the cargo and pull the trailer out? I'll pay!

The driver of our old truck got stuck on the way to the transformer area, apparently trying to take a shortcut. Of course, the company has already ordered us a better truck, but it's best not to waste old assets. Can you bring the truck back?

Hey, pal, would you be interested in a side gig? I need to stock up on gasoline and sand. You never know when you might run out of fuel or need to build up a bank. So, can you get me the stuff? I'll pay!

displayName: The Gifts of the Sun: Practice
descriptionText: Curious about firing up the solar station, aren't you? Can't blame youâthis doesn't happen every day. For us, the final piece of the puzzle is getting the new transformer installed at the substation to convert the power. Can you haul it over?

I've taken this route more than a few times to show tourists around. But today luck wasn't on our side, and we got stuck. Looks like the road's completely washed out. Can you help me and my passengers? Get us back to the hotel? I'll make it worth your while.

cargo_needed: 2× Bricks; 1× Wooden Planks Medium; 1× Wooden Planks
descriptionText: I don't get why people argue whether brick or wood makes a better house. Why not use both? I've already signed off on the blueprint for the new houseâjust need the materials delivered. By the way, care to help with the delivery?

The puddles don't seem to be frozen over. Weirdâwhy did my car skid? I tried to slow down and straighten out before the turn but ended up in the ditch anyway, and there's a lake right behind it. Can you help me get out and fix up the car? I can pay!

cargo_needed: 400× Consumable Repairs; 4× Junk Open; 4× Junk Closed
descriptionText: Our region isn't called the Valley of Falling Rocks for nothing. Just the other day, a massive rockslide came down right on a passing train. No one was hurt, thankfully, but we need to deal with the aftermath as soon as possible!

cargo_needed: 1× Metal Planks; 2× Bricks; 1× Bags; 2× Wooden Planks; 1× Wooden Planks Medium
descriptionText: Tourist season is fast approaching, and interior work still isn't finished! We need resources to get the job done ASAP. The construction crew is standing idle. Can you help us out? We'll cover all the costs!

I'm sure you know about this building restoration method that uses original materials. But we can't manage with just the old stones alone. Without modern materials, everything here will fall apart. Could you help deliver them?

cargo_needed: 1× Metal Planks; 1× Pipes Medium; 1× Service Spare Parts
descriptionText: This industrial giant once supplied concrete products to the entire district, but now its facilities are empty. Well, we won't stand for it, not on our watch! It's time to restore the plant to its former glory, and your help will be crucial in this endeavor!

displayName: A New Life for a Tower
cargo_needed: 200× Consumable Repairs; 2× Junk Open; 2× Junk Closed
descriptionText: It's a terrible shame that one of the most ancient towers here has collapsed. But every cloud has a silver lining. Pieces of the original masonry will be used to restore our temple. So, when you're clearing the rubble, make sure to separate ordinary stones from the original masonry.

We've already run all the water lines to the building, but we still need the industrial boiler delivered and installed. Without hot water, what kind of reviews will we get from tourists? Can you handle the delivery for us?

Our regional agricultural company is offering support to local producers. As part of this support program, we've allocated a batch of soil fertilizer that needs to be delivered to the recipients. Will you take the job?

cargo_needed: 1× Concrete Slab; 1× Metal Planks; 1× Concrete Slab; 2× Bags
descriptionText: We have to think about passenger safety first and foremost, and we should start by restoring the old platforms. We need to deliver supplies to the two platforms so the construction crews can finish the restoration before the tourist season begins.

Since our chapels don't have a direct connection to the water supply, they need their fresh water reserves topped up from time to time. Usually, local drivers handle that, but no one's available right now. Can you help out?

cargo_needed: 1× Sensory Buoy; 1× Sensory Buoy; 1× Sensory Buoy; 1× Sensory Buoy
descriptionText: You're well aware that, to expand further, the local agricultural company needs to analyze the local reservoirs' water composition, since it directly affects crop yields in the area. It's simpleâ4 buoys for 4 lakes. Can you handle it?

Great news! The local agricultural company is offering new grants to all interested farmers to boost their production volume. Many have already been approved for supportânow it just needs to be delivered. And we need a carrier, someone like you.

It's also important to address the food situation. The kitchen is ready, all the appliances and furniture have been delivered, but we're short on freezers to store our food in. We need to get a couple of them deliveredâcould you help?
Even though the local chapels don't have many parishioners, keeping them in good condition is our responsibility. So, each one needs a little TLC. Can you get us the supplies? It's not much...

It's always one thing after another. And while this rockslide happened after our trains were cut off, it's still no good that it's blocking the tracks. This one's a quick fixâa couple of planks should do the trick. Can you deliver some?

Now that the rocks are out of the way, all we have to do is fix the rails. It's a good thing our warehouse has pre-assembled sections of track just sitting there. We need you to deliver them to each of the crash sites. That should let us restore railway traffic.

What a disaster, our harvest is drying up! The hygrometer's readings have plummeted. The plants are starting to wilt, and our water reserves are running dangerously low. We need water. A lot of it. We'll pay wellâjust get it here, fast!

Hey there, pal! The local agricultural company has big plans for the fertile plots in the region. Thing is, we need to analyze the soil in the mountainous areasâcheck its structure and density. Feel like playing geologist for a while?

Welcome! This region is known for its vast forests, clean air, and scenic mountainscapes. But tourists are still a rare sight around here. So, while you're at it, why not stop by these places and enjoy the view?

Ah, a new face! We're trying to patch the hotel into the communication network, but the reception's weak and the frequency keeps jumping. Think you could lend us a hand? A good folding radar would sort this coverage issue right out.

Hey, traveler! Since you're passing through, care to lend a hand? We're running low on fuel, the portable generator's on its last legs, and we're short on spare parts, too. If you can haul this stuff over for us, we'll make it worth your while!

Hold up there, sonny! Care to do an old man a favor? You're the only heavy rig driver around these parts. Could you bring me some construction boards? My old house is getting a bit drafty. I'll see you rightâwon't let kindness go cold.

displayName: No Food for the Wood Borers
descriptionText: Ugh, if there's one thing I can't stand around here, it's these pests. The wood-boring beetles are multiplying like nobody's business, and that's bad for timber houses. If it's not too much trouble, could you bring us some solid planks for repairs?

displayName: The Secrets Buried in the Soil
descriptionText: Can't say why, but over the last few years the swamp's been spreading, and the water level's crept up a good half-centimeter on average. Even though the water's stagnant. Please check the geological activity for usâwe'll make it worth your while.

Hey there, traveler! I've lived here for a long time, and with the agricultural company expanding in the region, all the roads are seeing more traffic, which isn't doing them any favors. Could you drive around and check what shape the mountain trails are in?
Listen, buddy, we've got a bit of a task on our hands. We need to scout around the logging base and look for quality timber. Our current spot's running dry, and we need to start planning a move.

Hey, buddy, have you heard the local tale about the hermit who still lives all alone out in the marshes? They say you might just run into him out there. Are you up for a ride? I bet you won't be coming back.

Hey, good to see you! The locals and I occasionally set up races along the mountain trails. If you're looking for a shot of adrenaline, you've come to the right place. So, care to test your skills? But be warnedâit's pretty risky!
